**Pay Equity Consultant Tender Announcement**
=============================================

**Title** | **English** | **French**

**Pay Equity Consultant** | Conseiller en équité salariale

**Reference Number** | PW-22-01006087 | numéro de référence: PW-22-01006087

**Solicitation Number** | MA021-22-0125 | no de sollicitation: MA021-22-0125

**Publication Date** | 2022-09-02 | date de publication: 2022-09-02

**Tender Closing Date** | 2022-09-20T13:00:00 | Date limite de soumission: 2022-09-20T13:00:00

The Canadian government seeks a Pay Equity Consultant to support Marine Atlantic Inc. in achieving pay equity compliance. This tender announcement outlines the requirements and evaluation process for a successful candidate.

**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**
--------------------------------------

Marine Atlantic Inc. invites qualified suppliers to submit proposals for the provision of Pay Equity Consultant services. The successful candidate will be responsible for supporting the development, implementation, and monitoring of a pay equity plan to ensure compliance with the Canadian Human Rights Act.

**Services Required**
------------------

The services required include:

* Conducting a detailed review of the current pay equity situation
* Developing an assessment methodology
* Evaluating single versus multiple pay equity plans
* Providing project management support
* Developing a communications plan
* Conducting a preliminary review and identifying gaps and risks
* Developing a process for data collection and storage
* Reviewing job descriptions and identifying gaps and areas of improvement

**Evaluation Process and Selection Methodology**
----------------------------------------------

The evaluation process will consist of three main components:

1. Mandatory technical criteria
2. Point-rated technical criteria
3. Financial evaluation

The selection process will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Opening Date and Closing Date**
---------------------------------

The RFP opens on 2022-09-02 and closes on 2022-09-20T13:00:00.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For further information, please contact:

* Paul Lewis, IRCR
* Phone: 902-794-5244
* Email: [plewis@marine-atlantic.ca](mailto:plewis@marine-atlantic.ca) ใหญ
